page.title: 04Recreation in Uzmaston area
page.content: The training of sheep-dogs has become popular through the television programme, 'One Man and his Dog', when the skill of farmer and dog is combined. This is the hobby of W.T.DAVIES of Uzmaston Farm, Welsh President of the International Sheep - dog Society (1983-6), who also carves his shepherd's crooks. Young Farmers Clubs have the motto 'Good Farmers-Good Countrymen-Good Citizens' and meet weekly for members of 25 years and under. Classes are provided in Stock Judging, Folk Dancing, Home Economics,Drama and Public Speaking. A Rally of Competitions is held in May when money is raised for charity and exchange visits. Interest in physical fitness induces local walkers, joggers and runners to enjoy our lanes. A caravan site for tourists exists.
